casebody.data:
Philips
v.
Pitt County Memorial Hospital, Inc., et al. 368P12-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 22, 2016 C. David Creech, Attorney at Law, Jay C. Salsman, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Pitt County Memorial Hospital Incorporated, et al. Sherif A. Philips, for Philips, Sherif A. (M.D.).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2016 by Plaintiff for Petition for Reconsideration of Recusal Honorable Judge Richard L. Doughton:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of July 2016."
